name: TinyImage

fit.description: Determine how the image fits into the container size
fit.description_zh: 确定图片如何适应容器大小

preview-src-list.description: Specifies a list of images when previewing a large image
preview-src-list.description_zh: 指定预览大图时的图片列表

scroll-container.description:
Specifies the rolling container. When lazy loading is enabled, listen for scroll events in the scroll container to lazy load.
                This property is used to set the container of the image, and when the container is not set, the parent element with the latest overflow value of auto or scroll will be used as the scrolling container by default
scroll-container.description_zh:
指定滚动容器。启用懒加载时，监听滚动容器的 scroll 事件来懒加载。
                该属性用于设置图片的容器,当未设置容器时，默认会取最近一个 overflow 值为 auto 或 scroll 的父元素做为滚动容器

show-index.description: Enable the display of image serial numbers

src.description: Set the path of the image

:z-index.description: When previewing the image, set the z-index of the outermost element
:z-index.description_zh: 图片预览功能时，设置最外层元素的 z-index

events.name: error
events.description: An event that is triggered after an image fails to be loaded, with the parameter set to the original failure event
events.description_zh: 图片加载失败后触发的事件，参数为原生的失败事件

events.name: load
events.description: The event triggered when the image is loaded successfully, and the parameter is the original success event
events.description_zh: 图片加载成功的触发的事件，参数为原生的成功事件

slots.name: error
slots.description: Placeholder content slots where images failed to load
slots.description_zh: 图片加载失败的占位内容插槽

slots.name: placeholder
slots.description: Placeholder content slots for image loading
slots.description_zh: 图片加载的占位内容插槽

description: 图片组件，支持懒加载以及自适应容器大小等，同时还支持点击全屏浏览图册的功能。
description_zh: 图片组件，支持懒加载以及自适应容器大小等，同时还支持点击全屏浏览图册的功能。
